  • java.lang.Object
    • tijos.framework.devicecenter.TiI2CMaster

  • public class TiI2CMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    The TiI2CMaster for devicecenter of framework.

                        throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        portID - port id[IN], range:0-3
        Returns:
        TiI2CMaster object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs

                 int offset,

        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]

      • read

        public void read(byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len,
                 boolean repeated)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Read the bytes data from salve
        Parameters:
        data - data array[OUT]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        repeated - need repeat, if repeated == true, no stop; if repeated == false, have stop
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If data == null
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

                 byte[] data,

                 int len,

        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]

      • selectSlave

        public void selectSlave(int address)
        Select the slave device by address that have R/W flag bit
        Parameters:
        address - slave address[IN],range:0-255, 7bits address + 1bit R/W flag
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If address value out of range

      • setBaudRate

        public void setBaudRate(int baud)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Set the baud rate, have platform dependencies
        Parameters:
        baud - baud rate[IN] baud:100,100Kbps, standard speed, default baud:400,400Kbps, fast speed baud:3400,3.4Mbps, high speed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If baud value out of range

      • setClockStretch

        public void setClockStretch(int timeout)
        Set the clock stretch timeout
        Parameters:
        timeout - clock stretch timeout value, unit:us, range:0-1000
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If timeout value out of range
